title: A description of the nature of four-footed beasts with their figures en[graven in brass] / written in Latin by Dr. John Johnston ; translated into English by J.P.
author: Jonstonus, Joannes, 1603-1675.
publisher: Printed for the widow of John Jacobsen Schipper, and Stephen Swart,
notes: Translation of: Historiae naturalis de quadrupetibus [sic], which forms part of his work on animals.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
Imperfect: some letters missing on t.p.
